pullRequest.title: Rename digital twins options objects by copying objects and renaming
pullRequest.bodyText: Since autorest cannot be configured to rename these generated options objects, we will create copies of every options object and then rename them to better match the method that uses them

commit.message:
Rename digital twins options objects by copying objects and renaming

Since autorest cannot be configured to rename these generated options objects, we will create copies of every options object and then rename them to better match the method that uses them

nodes.bodyText: nit: I would break this down for better readability, especially when there is a conditional statement involved. here and everywhere

I am not sure if we can have a public method that has a return type from the implementation package.
Spoke to Tim offline and he is confirming that assumption.
